Description: Fragment of floor and upper part of foot of Attic black glaze pottery cup-kantharos; wholly glazed; interior: stamped palmettes; exterior: ribbed lower wall; moulding at top of foot; inscription cut on underside of foot. Nearly joins 1888,0601.240b-c.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ8
Curator's comments: The piece is similar to mid-fourth century material from the Athenian Agora, Sparkes 1970a, nos. 673-4. Φ08 in pencil on broken edge.
Bibliographic references: Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (p. 68, no. 874, pl. XXII)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 694, no. 511)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1543)
